introduction: SYNOPSISHye-rim is a senior at a women's university. She tries to get engaged to a friend's boyfriend but Kyung-su seduces and toys with her before breaking up her engagement. Hye-rim suffers under the sexually perverse Kyung-su until she finally kills him and ends up in prison. Time passes and Hye-rim receives a special pardon. She goes off to rest when she meets Dong-min. Hye-rim falls in love with him but is tormented by her past. Hye-rim disappears and Dong-min ends up in the hospital due to the shock. Ultimately, Dong-min's mother persuades Hye-rim to see Dong-min at the hospital. But Dong-min dies holding Hye-rim's hand.故事当他毕业于一所女子大学时，他拦截了他的朋友的情人，并试图参与，但他伤害了霍林姆，并且厌恶了霍林的订婚。惠尔姆遭受了硬ty ty的暴政，最终杀死了硬水并入狱。随着时间的流逝，他出来成为一名特使，但他在去度假村的路上遇到了他的朋友，并爱上了他，但他因为过去而感到痛苦。最终，东明说服禹惠林的母亲赶到医院，但东明由手工禹惠林死亡。
